alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 5:22PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Yuma County through 600 PM MST... At 521 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinter to 8 miles south of Ligurta to 18 miles south of Fortuna Foothills. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fortuna Foothills, Wellton, Blaisdell, Tacna, Tyson, Kinter, Ligurta, Mohawk and Roll. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 12 and 57. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 33 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma
